name: Snake: The Elder Forest
description:
Snake: The Elder Forest is an casual-adventure game currently in development by two-man "team" called Fractal Dimension Games.
The Elder Forest is a special world with ancient forest that is in danger. To save this world the Snake was called from another one. The energy of those worlds is different so all "aliens" (including your character) can only be in sphere form and can't stop to be alive! The Snake has ability to use this energy gaining more power and learning new skills, but it is weak at the start, so before the danger is coming, you should become more powerful to be ready to repel the Elder Forest!
During gameplay you'll meet a lot of challenges, traps and puzzles that you ought to solve!
